comments.body: True, however 95% of the time some one will be using [`@types/geojson`](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/geojson) and the [Point types are defined as `number[]`](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/geojson/index.d.ts#L20).
